Title: KIRKS FOLLY LIMITED EDITION Naked Cherubs Stars Crystal Pin Brooch RARE 4M
Description: This ULTRA rare Kirks Folly brooch pin is number 418 of only 500 ever made! Also, this is the first cartouche (the oval tag that is signed on the back of the pin) that we have encountered that has Kirks Folly as Kirk's Folly…with an apostrophe…MAKING THIS PIECE EVEN MORE RARE!! This brooch features three naked cherubs with aurora borealis crystal accents and dangling crystals that fall from the hand of one of the cherubs. The pin measures approximately 3.75 inches by 2 inches. This treasure has been stored for many years! It will be sent in a Kirks Folly gift box!!! SHIPPING:Combined shipping discounts are available.
